com.code.aon.product.strategy
Interface IPriceStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicPriceStrategy
public interface IPriceStrategy

Manages ICalculable objects to obtain the prices. Prices included in price strategy are with or without taxes, and allows to parametrice tariffs.

Since:
1.0
